message: “It’s been a huge gap in our New York law,” he added. “It’s bad enough as a trafficking survivor to testify against your pimp or your trafficker — to do that as a child takes unbelievable courage. This will help us protect those kids.”

data.description: Gov. Andrew Cuomo on Wednesday signed legislation that eliminates a mind-boggling loophole in state law that required prosecutors to prove victims of child sex trafficking weren’t willing par…
data.title: Cuomo signs sex trafficking legislation that closes loophole
